data.text: @irishmafia22 @Jusrangers Let’s hope the parents are smart enough not to do that. I don’t have faith but we can all keep our fingers crossed. I also think she’ll skew the numbers to her advantage no matter what. #Witch
@Jusrangers Wait - they had an OUTDOOR mandate?

@Jusrangers When do we say enough is enough? The CDC, science, reason, our children, any sane person & etc think kids should not be masking, so why are our kids still masking? At this point parents at their option should make the decision. If they did this mandate would end within a week.
@Jusrangers I don't understand why my county is orange. We peaked a few weeks ago and cases have been going down. I think CDC hates red states.
@Jusrangers Kathy’s evil little plan is to test all the children before return, pump up the fake positives, and keep it all status quo.  It’s clearly all a coordinated plan.
@Jusrangers Even though the mask mandates are ending in CA, in City of Los Angeles, as an unvaxxed person, I still can't eat in a restaurant, get a haircut in a salon ,or see a movie in a theater
